name: Continent of Sound
description: @zorkball - At the end of 2020, I made a 6 hour mix of music which contained at least one song from every country in Africa called "Continent of Sound". I ended up learning a lot during the project, and was pleased with the results. This NFT is the cover art for the mix. It contains linguistic and architectural snippets from all over Africa and I think it visually represents the project well. (.PNG, 7016X4960px)
